links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (genericIndex)a038135 n = genericIndex a038135_list na038135_list = 0 : 1 : 1 : 1 : f 1 1 1 4 where   f u v w x = y : f v w y (x + 1) where     y = q (x - u) + q (x - v) + q (x - w)     q z = if abs z >= x then 0 else a038135 $ abs z-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 21 2014
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 04 2000
